title: Assignment 1
text: Assignment 1 was to create a repository to store my assignments and publish this website featuring a simple plot to verify that everything is working.

title: Assignment 1
text:
A Simple Plot
For the simple plot, I decided to create a histogram of 1000 generated IQ scores. IQ scores are normally distributed with a mean of 100 and a standard deviation of 15.

Code# Generate a sample of 1000 IQ scores from a normal distribution
# with a mean of 100 and a standard deviation of 15
generated_iq_scores <- rnorm(n = 1000, mean = 100, sd = 15)

# Create a histogram to visualize the distribution of the generated IQ scores
hist(generated_iq_scores,
     main = "Distribution of Generated IQ Scores",
     xlab = "IQ score",
     ylab = "Frequency")

title: About
text:
Welcome! This website contains my assignments for the course “Introduction to Computational Modeling of Behavior” taught by Ven Popov at the University of Zurich (HS24).
The content will be continuously added during the semester.
